name: MonsterScanner
0:
”Alexa, ask Monster Scanner to check my bed for monsters.”
”Alexa, ask Monster Scanner to start a scan.”
”Alexa, ask Monster Scanner to look for monsters.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monster scanner
des: This skill will "scan" the room for monsters (under the bed, in the closet, etc) and report back what it finds. Don't worry, it'll never actually find a monster so you can be sure the room is always monster free. It's meant to be used as a fun way to help your young children get ready for bed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
